main event: A cigar-shaped object, about the size of a small airplane, was observed in Salt Lake City on June 19, 1957.
interesting points: The object was bright metallic in color., The sighting lasted less than 30 seconds., The object flew straight South-Southeast and vanished., There was a possibility that it was a reflection from an aircraft nearby., The observer reported the object after being distracted by noise from an airplane.
witness description: Staff Sergeant, 31 years old, Truck Driver
